query:
ALTER TABLE spc_defect_records 
ADD COLUMN verificationStatus ENUM('pending', 'real_ng', 'ntf') DEFAULT 'pending',
ADD COLUMN verifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN verifiedBy INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN verificationNotes TEXT NULL,
ADD COLUMN ntfReason VARCHAR(200) NULL;
